  • nodejs
  • bip39
  • bignumber.js
  • Electron

Additional Resources and Guides:

  • https://iancoleman.io/bip39/#english (Mnemonic Code Converter)
  • https://bitzuma.com/posts/how-to-verify-an-electrum-download-on-windows (Verify an Electrum donwload on Windows)
  • https://bitzuma.com/posts/how-to-verify-an-electrum-download-on-mac/ (Verify an Electrum donwload on Mac)
If you want to use the private key generation tool please make sure you have verified the GPG signature of the downloaded file. For more information regarding the signer's public key, checkout the gpg-pub-key folder in the source code.
Contact: btcfromscratch@protonmail.com
